verses.esv: 15 Behold, I am with you and will keep you wherever you go, and will bring you back to this land. For I will not leave you until I have done what I have promised you.”
verses.kjv: 15 And, behold, I am with thee, and will keep thee in all places whither thou goest, and will bring thee again into this land; for I will not leave thee, until I have done that which I have spoken to thee of.
verses.niv: 15 I am with you and will watch over you wherever you go, and I will bring you back to this land. I will not leave you until I have done what I have promised you."

verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

verses.esv: 8 It is the LORD who goes before you. He will be with you; he will not leave you or forsake you. Do not fear or be dismayed.”
verses.kjv: 8 And the LORD, he it is that doth go before thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee, neither forsake thee: fear not, neither be dismayed.
verses.niv: 8 The LORD himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged."

verses.esv: 24 Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and they shall become one flesh.
verses.kjv: 24 Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
verses.niv: 24 For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and they will become one flesh.

verses.esv: 28 And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.
verses.kjv: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.niv: 28 And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

verses.esv: 20 “Behold, I send an angel before you to guard you on the way and to bring you to the place that I have prepared.
verses.kjv: 20 Behold, I send an Angel before thee, to keep thee in the way, and to bring thee into the place which I have prepared.
verses.niv: 20 "See, I am sending an angel ahead of you to guard you along the way and to bring you to the place I have prepared.

verses.esv:
3   Commit your work to the LORD,
    and your plans will be established.
verses.kjv: 3 Commit thy works unto the LORD, and thy thoughts shall be established.
verses.niv: 3 Commit to the LORD whatever you do, and your plans will succeed.

verses.esv: 18 so that by two unchangeable things, in which it is impossible for God to lie, we who have fled for refuge might have strong encouragement to hold fast to the hope set before us.
verses.kjv: 18 That by two immutable things, in which it was impossible for God to lie, we might have a strong consolation, who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us:
verses.niv: 18 God did this so that, by two unchangeable things in which it is impossible for God to lie, we who have fled to take hold of the hope offered to us may be greatly encouraged.

verses.esv:
160   The sum of your word is truth,
    and every one of your righteous rules endures forever.
verses.kjv: 160 Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.
verses.niv: 160 All your words are true; all your righteous laws are eternal.

verses.esv:
18   Surely there is a future,
    and your hope will not be cut off.
verses.kjv: 18 For surely there is an end; and thine expectation shall not be cut off.
verses.niv: 18 There is surely a future hope for you, and your hope will not be cut off.

verses.esv:
19   God is not man, that he should lie,
    or a son of man, that he should change his mind.
  Has he said, and will he not do it?
    Or has he spoken, and will he not fulfill it?
verses.kjv: 19 God is not a man, that he should lie; neither the son of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good?
verses.niv: 19 God is not a man, that he should lie, nor a son of man, that he should change his mind. Does he speak and then not act? Does he promise and not fulfill?

verses.esv: 15 And he said to him, “If your presence will not go with me, do not bring us up from here.
verses.kjv: 15 And he said unto him, If thy presence go not with me, carry us not up hence.
verses.niv: 15 Then Moses said to him, "If your Presence does not go with us, do not send us up from here.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv:
18   “Remember not the former things,
    nor consider the things of old.
19   Behold, I am doing a new thing;
    now it springs forth, do you not perceive it?
  I will make a way in the wilderness
    and rivers in the desert.
verses.kjv: 18 Remember ye not the former things, neither consider the things of old. 19 Behold, I will do a new thing; now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert.
verses.niv: 18 "Forget the former things; do not dwell on the past. 19 See, I am doing a new thing! Now it springs up; do you not perceive it? I am making a way in the desert and streams in the wasteland.

verses.esv:
24   Be strong, and let your heart take courage,
    all you who wait for the LORD!
verses.kjv: 24 Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the LORD.
verses.niv: 24 Be strong and take heart, all you who hope in the LORD.

verses.esv: 26 And he made from one man every nation of mankind to live on all the face of the earth, having determined allotted periods and the boundaries of their dwelling place,
verses.kjv: 26 And hath made of one blood all nations of men for to dwell on all the face of the earth, and hath determined the times before appointed, and the bounds of their habitation;
verses.niv: 26 From one man he made every nation of men, that they should inhabit the whole earth; and he determined the times set for them and the exact places where they should live.

verses.esv:
27   For he draws up the drops of water;
    they distill his mist in rain,
28   which the skies pour down
    and drop on mankind abundantly.
verses.kjv: 27 For he maketh small the drops of water: they pour down rain according to the vapour thereof: 28 Which the clouds do drop and distil upon man abundantly.
verses.niv: 27 "He draws up the drops of water, which distill as rain to the streams; 28 the clouds pour down their moisture and abundant showers fall on mankind.

verses.esv: 12:1 I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship. 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
verses.kjv: 1 I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service. 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.niv: 1 Therefore, I urge you, brothers, in view of God's mercy, to offer your bodies as living sacrifices, holy and pleasing to God--this is your spiritual act of worship. 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.

verses.esv:
5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
6   In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. 6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; 6 in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

verses.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
verses.kjv: 17 Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
verses.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!

verses.esv:
9   Yet the righteous holds to his way,
    and he who has clean hands grows stronger and stronger.
verses.kjv: 9 The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.
verses.niv: 9 Nevertheless, the righteous will hold to their ways, and those with clean hands will grow stronger.

verses.esv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
verses.kjv: 20 I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
verses.niv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.

verses.esv: 12 Not that I have already obtained this or am already perfect, but I press on to make it my own, because Christ Jesus has made me his own.
verses.kjv: 12 Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 12 Not that I have already obtained all this, or have already been made perfect, but I press on to take hold of that for which Christ Jesus took hold of me.

5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding;

    and a light to my path.

verses.niv: 105 Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light for my path.
